front.title: IEEE Draft Standard Specifications for High Voltage (> 1000 V) Expulsion and Current-limiting Power Class Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches
front.abstract: Specifications for high voltage (above 1000 volts) expulsion and current-limiting type power class fuses, fuse disconnecting switches, their associated fuse links, disconnecting cutouts, and accessories for these devices are covered. All of these devices are intended for use on alternating current distribution systems.
